data.eml:eml: The Indian species of Liophloeothrips Priesner (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae) with one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tyagi, Kaomud, Kumar, Vikas (2011): The Indian species of Liophloeothrips Priesner (Thysanoptera, Phlaeothripidae) with one new species. Zootaxa 2803: 21-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206543
